title: Account Management - Update Client Contacts
description: A client informs their account manager that their primary point of contact has left the company.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the information and ask for the name and details of the new primary contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager gathers the new contact's information.

tasks.description: Update the primary contact information in the PSA tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client record in the PSA is updated.

tasks.description: Send a welcome email to the new primary contact, introducing themself and the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: A positive relationship is initiated with the new contact.
